title: Fragment, 1902-1-568-a,b, 16th–17th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic
Technique: supplementary warp forming cut and uncut raised pile in plain weave foundation with supplementary wefts
provenance: ex. coll. Antonio Vivès y Escudero
description: Detached forms including plant shapes and an orb in green velvet in tan faced with metallic gold.
